info.author: Denis Kuznetsov
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.name: dff
info.summary: The Dialog Flow Framework (DFF) allows you to write conversational services. The service is written by defining a special dialog graph that describes the behavior of the dialog service. The dialog graph contains the dialog script. DFF offers a specialized language (DSL) for quickly writing dialog graphs. You can use it in such services for writing skills for Amazon Alexa and etc, chat-bots for social networks, websites call-centers and etc.

info.summary: Dialog Flow Framework is a free and open-source software stack for creating chatbots, released under the terms of Apache License 2.0.
